title: Proclamation Granting Regulatory Relief for Certain Stationary Sources to Promote American Mineral Security
summary: This proclamation directs regulatory relief for certain stationary sources to support American mineral security, with emphasis on the role of copper in energy, defense, and manufacturing sectors. It highlights the importance of maintaining and increasing domestic copper smelting capacity to reduce reliance on foreign supply chains and to strengthen the resilience of supply chains for minerals critical to national interests. The proclamation describes the intended effect as facilitating regulatory relief for specified stationary sources to enhance domestic mineral production and processing, thereby contributing to overall American mineral security.

title: Nomination of Jennifer Wicks McNamara to be Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary to the Socialist Republic of Vietnam
summary: The President has nominated Jennifer Wicks McNamara, of Virginia, to serve as the United States ambassador to the Socialist Republic of Vietnam. The nomination has been sent to the United States Senate for consideration.

title: Proclamation: National Day of Remembrance for Charlie Kirk
summary: A presidential proclamation designates a National Day of Remembrance in connection with the death of Charlie Kirk on September 10, 2025. The proclamation notes that the incident occurred on a campus courtyard and calls for nationwide observances and appropriate acknowledgments to honor Charlie Kirk's memory.
